title: Fashion History Mystery #50: Count Chardonnet and the Quest for Artificial Silk
itunes:title: Fashion History Mystery #50: Count Chardonnet and the Quest for Artificial Silk
description:
How do Louis Pasteur, Thomas Edison and an enigmatic French Count factor into the history of one of the most widely used textiles on the planet? Tune in to find out!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
